Text: I think that does it for DC/Vertigo releases this week.  Next week is light:  DCU Online Legends, Justice League, THUNDER Agents, The Shade, and Legion: Secret Origin from DC and Unwritten .5 from Vertigo (that I upload, anyway).
thank you thank you thank you!!!!

Hey Xp,I know that you're a "fan" of Rob Liefeld as much I am,I've been meaning to write a piece about him,but this guy did this before,so check this shit up:http://www.progressiveboink.com/archive/robliefeld.html

Best article ever.  And everything in it is entirely true.  I love it.
Fun fact.  If you google "worst comic book artist," that is the first result.  And any online discussion of horrible comic book artists will have Liefeld mentioned in at least half the posts.
